comment: Attendance isn't mandatory but there are in-class assignments that you'll lose the points for. Everything is through Cengage with easy quizzes. Some assignments are difficult but it's nothing a little googling won't help you with. Tests are hard, but there are only two. Take advantage of the multiple extra credit opportunities and you'll be fine.

Professor Trammell is great. This is a mandatory class for graduation, so if you're just looking for an easy class, she is a good professor to choose. There are only a few tests and a final, some random group projects, 1 global essay paper and that's it. It's pretty easy. Missing the class every once in a while is fine. She's super friendly too.

I loved this professor! She's really nice. Easy grader. She is understanding about your personal life outside of the class. Tests are a little tricky but not if you read the chapters! TAKE HER! Shes awesome! Best choice you will ever make.

Good teacher. Gives tons of work. Easier Grader. Test are not cumlative. The first test is hard after that the test are much easier. She gives extra credit. Do not have to buy the book as long as you do spark notes.
